Getting started UI Components API Doc

UI Components

Built to provide extensible popovers, iconography, form validations, and more.

Messages

Oops, something wrong happened.
Do you need any help?
Here's more information.
Warning! something might be wrong.
Everything is great!

Generic message, with an icon.

How to use

Add class ch-box-icon to any block element (div, section, p, etc.). Combine with any class listed below to give contextual styling (see Boxes):

  • ch-box
  • ch-box-lite
  • ch-box-container
  • ch-box-error
  • ch-box-help
  • ch-box-info
  • ch-box-warn
  • ch-box-ok

Add any icon into any box for more contextual messages.

<div class="ch-box-icon ch-box-error">
    <i class="ch-icon-remove-sign"></i> Oops, something wrong happened.
</div>

Icons

Define any icon classname from the list below, and change size by adding any of these classes:

<i class="ch-icon-camera ch-icon-xx-large"></i>
<i class="ch-icon-camera ch-icon-x-large"></i>
<i class="ch-icon-camera ch-icon-large"></i>
<i class="ch-icon-camera"></i>

Buttons

Default state

Disabled

How to use

Any button is created in 3 parts:

<dl class=”ch-list> <dt>Color</dt> <dd>Add ch-btn for default buttons, or ch-btn-skin for skin buttons.</dd> <dt>Size</dt> <dd>Optionally, include ch-btn-small or ch-btn-large to change the default size.</dd> <dt>Availability</dt> <dd>Optionally, include ch-btn-disabled to disable any button.</dd> </dl>

Examples

Default button:

<input type="button" class="ch-btn" value="Button"/>

Large button:

<input type="button" class="ch-btn ch-btn-large" value="Button Large"/>

With icon:

<button class="ch-btn-skin ch-btn-small"><i class="ch-icon-cog"></i> With icon</button>

Disabled:

<input type="button" class="ch-btn ch-btn-disabled" value="Disabled button"/>

Boxes

Box Container

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. In accumsan malesuada euismod.

Box Lite

Maecenas nec eros vitae quam condimentum malesuada eget eu mauris.

Box

In viverra, risus at congue porta, risus orci scelerisque sem, vitae lobortis nisl nunc in odio.

Box Error

Oops, something wrong happened.

Box Help

Do you need some help?

Box Info

Here's more contextual information about it.

Box Warn

Warning! something might be wrong.

Box Ok

Everything is great!

How to use

Add any class listed below to any block element (div, section, p, etc.):

  • ch-box
  • ch-box-lite
  • ch-box-container
  • ch-box-error
  • ch-box-help
  • ch-box-info
  • ch-box-warn
  • ch-box-ok
<div class="ch-box-error">
    <h3>Box Error</h3>
    <p>Oops, something wrong happened.</p>
</div>

Lists

Unstyled

  • Foo
  • Bar
  • Baz
  • Qux

Unordered

  • Foo
  • Bar
  • Baz
  • Qux

Ordered

  1. Foo
  2. Bar
  3. Baz
  4. Qux

Description

Foo
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet.
Bar
Consectetur adipiscing elit.

How to use

Add class ch-list to any HTML list element.

<ul class="ch-list">
    ...
</ul>
